properties.description: This alert leverages Defender for IoT to detect attacks that would prevent the use or proper operation of a DCS system including Denial of Service events.
properties.displayName: Denial of Service (Microsoft Defender for IoT)
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT"
| where AlertName == "Suspicion of Denial Of Service Attack"
| where TimeGenerated <= ProcessingEndTime + 60m
| extend DeviceId = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DeviceId)
| extend SourceDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SourceDeviceAddress)
| extend DestDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DestinationDeviceAddress)
| extend RemediationSteps = tostring(parse_json(RemediationSteps)[0])
| extend Protocol = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Protocol)
| project
  TimeGenerated,
  DeviceId,
  ProductName,
  ProductComponentName,
  AlertSeverity,
  AlertName,
  Description,
  Protocol,
  SourceDeviceAddress,
  DestDeviceAddress,
  RemediationSteps,
  Tactics,
  Entities,
  VendorOriginalId,
  AlertLink

properties.description: This alert leverages Defender for IoT to detect excessive login attempts that may indicate improper service configuration, human error, or malicious activity on the network such as a cyber threat attempting to manipulate the SCADA network.
properties.displayName: Excessive Login Attempts (Microsoft Defender for IoT)
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT"
| where AlertName == "Excessive Login Attempts" 
or AlertName == "Excessive SMB login attempts" 
or AlertName == "Password Guessing Attempt Detected"
or AlertName == "Excessive Number of Sessions"
| where TimeGenerated <= ProcessingEndTime + 60m
| extend DeviceId = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DeviceId)
| extend SourceDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SourceDeviceAddress)
| extend DestDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DestinationDeviceAddress)
| extend RemediationSteps = tostring(parse_json(RemediationSteps)[0])
| extend Protocol = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Protocol)
| project
  TimeGenerated,
  DeviceId,
  ProductName,
  ProductComponentName,
  AlertSeverity,
  AlertName,
  Description,
  Protocol,
  SourceDeviceAddress,
  DestDeviceAddress,
  RemediationSteps,
  Tactics,
  Entities,
  VendorOriginalId,
  AlertLink

properties.description: This alert leverages Defender for IoT to detect unauthorized firmware updates that may indicate malicious activity on the network such as a cyber threat that attempts to manipulate PLC firmware to compromise PLC function.
properties.displayName: Firmware Updates (Microsoft Defender for IoT)
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT"
| where AlertName == "Beckhoff Software Changed" 
or AlertName contains "Firmware Version Changed"
or AlertName contains "Firmware Change"
or AlertName contains "Firmware Changed"
or AlertName contains "Firmware Update"
| where TimeGenerated <= ProcessingEndTime + 60m
| extend DeviceId = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DeviceId)
| extend SourceDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SourceDeviceAddress)
| extend DestDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DestinationDeviceAddress)
| extend RemediationSteps = tostring(parse_json(RemediationSteps)[0])
| extend Protocol = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Protocol)
| project
  TimeGenerated,
  DeviceId,
  ProductName,
  ProductComponentName,
  AlertSeverity,
  AlertName,
  Description,
  Protocol,
  SourceDeviceAddress,
  DestDeviceAddress,
  RemediationSteps,
  Tactics,
  Entities,
  VendorOriginalId,
  AlertLink

properties.description: This alert leverages Defender for IoT to detect an unusually high bandwidth which may be an indication of a new service/process or malicious activity on the network. An example scenario is a cyber threat attempting to manipulate the SCADA network.

  VendorOriginalId,
  AlertLink

properties.description: This alert leverages Defender for IoT to detect Illegal function codes in SCADA equipment indicating improper application configuration or malicious activity such using illegal values within a protocol to exploit a PLC vulnerability.
properties.displayName: Illegal Function Codes for ICS traffic (Microsoft Defender for IoT)
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT"
| where AlertName == "Function Code Not Supported by Outstation"
or AlertName == "Illegal BACNet message"
or AlertName == "Illegal Connection Attempt on Port 0"
or AlertName == "Illegal DNP3 Operation"
or AlertName == "Illegal MODBUS Operation (Exception Raised by Master)"
or AlertName == "Illegal MODBUS Operation (Function Code Zero)"
or AlertName == "Incorrect Parameter Sent to Outstation"
or AlertName == "Initiation of an Obsolete Function Code (Initialize Data)"
or AlertName == "Initiation of an Obsolete Function Code (Save Config)"
or AlertName == "Modbus Exception"
or AlertName == "Unknown Object Sent to Outstation"
or AlertName == "Usage of a Reserved Function Code"
or AlertName == "Usage of Improper Formatting by Outstation"
or AlertName == "Usage of Reserved Status Flags (IIN)"
or AlertName == "Unauthorized communication was detected by a User Defined Protocol Rule"
or AlertName == "Unauthorized Operation was detected by a User Defined whitelist Alert"
or AlertName == "Illegal Protocol Version"
or AlertName contains "Slave Device Received Illegal"
| where TimeGenerated <= ProcessingEndTime + 60m
| extend DeviceId = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DeviceId)
| extend SourceDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SourceDeviceAddress)
| extend DestDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DestinationDeviceAddress)
| extend RemediationSteps = tostring(parse_json(RemediationSteps)[0])
| extend Protocol = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Protocol)
| project
  TimeGenerated,
  DeviceId,
  ProductName,
  ProductComponentName,
  AlertSeverity,
  AlertName,
  Description,
  Protocol,
  SourceDeviceAddress,
  DestDeviceAddress,
  RemediationSteps,
  Tactics,
  Entities,
  VendorOriginalId,
  AlertLink
